alert.note: Alert for Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:16AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Steuben, east central Elkhart, Lagrange, southeastern St. Joseph, Branch, Hillsdale and northern Williams Counties through 300 AM EDT... At 216 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Litchfield to near Topeka. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hillsdale, Jonesville and Litchfield around 220 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Angola, Hamilton and Edon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 341 and 357. Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 21. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 114 and 156. Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
